rajagiriya pa්radeshaye pihiti rajaye idamak ansathu kirime siddhiya sambandhayen wana naduwa ada (28) kandawu awasthawe eeta adala wagauththarakaruwek wana nagaradhipathi janaka ranawaka adhikaranaya hamuwe peni sitiyen kolambaa athireka mahestha්rath chandima liyanage mahatha ema niyogaya nikuth karanu laba atha.

me anuwa pradeshiya lekam kottasa mattamin apanayana bhoga wagawa sanwardhanaya kirimata katayuthu karayi.sanwidhanathmakawa waga kirima, alewiya sanwidhanathmakawa kirimata upades dima me departhamenthuwe wagakimayi.me gowin thama alewi katayuthu atharamadiyan nathiwa karagena yamata kurundu shakthi ha gammiris shakthi washayen sangam pihituwa gena thibe.apanayana boga wagawata kapawi sitina gowinta thun saranaye pihita ha dewi dewathawunge aashirwadaya laba ganima me ran aswanu mangalyaye adahasa bawa amathyanshaye adhyaksha em. em. gunasinha mahatha pawasiya.thama thamange bhogawala prathama aswanna nela hewisi sahitha peraharin pamina aagamika wathawathwala yedi ema aswanna thriwidha rathnayata ha dewi dewathawunta puja kirima sidu kerini.athithaye wideshikayan shri lankawata paminiye ape rate inguru, gammiris, kurundu, ensal, karabu nati aadi sulu bogawalata waha watimen bawath, yalith rajaya me sulu apanayana bhoga sanwardhanayata katayuthu kirima wasanawak bawath anushasanawak kala bellanwila wiharawasi shasthrapathi nawinne wimalawansha himiyo pawasuha.kurundu shakthi sangamaye sabhapathi ee. di. subhasinha perera mahatha kiya sitiye aayurwedayata awashya inguru wani bhoga wideshawalin genwima thamange katayuthu walata awahirayakwi athi bawayi.
